scurity.query.authen: select u.USER_LOGIN as username, u.USER_PASSWORD as password, case when u.USER_STATUS = 'E' then 1 else 0 end as enabled from ${jdbc.default.schema}.NBTC_MS_USER u where u.USER_LOGIN = ? and u.USER_STATUS = 'E' and u.IS_DELETED = 0
scurity.query.authorize: select u.USER_LOGIN as username, map.ROLE_CODE as authority from ${jdbc.default.schema}.NBTC_MS_USER u inner join ${jdbc.default.schema}.NBTC_TR_USER_MAPPING map on map.USER_LOGIN = u.USER_LOGIN where u.USER_LOGIN = ? and u.USER_STATUS = 'E' and u.IS_DELETED = 0 and map.IS_DELETED = 0
